ygData.messageBody:
My view:

1) A player should be able to play the game any way they wish, as long as it doesn't directly affect the play of others in a negative way. Some people like to role-play, some people are powergamners & some people simple enjoy playing the game for what it is. If a person wishes to get a walkthrough for a quest, let him have his fun.

2) Spoilers are unavoidable. There is nothing Verant or anybody can do to eliminate them. They are there for those that want/need them.

3) If the polls are saying that people want walkthroughs, then it seems you are in the minority. :) Seriously, the polls may be a bit weighted towards powergamers but it is apparent that enough people want the spoilers to warrent their existance.

Munk
